description: Yeehaa excels in transformative design with extensive experience in both academics and industry. With a background in cognitive science and a career spanning various high-impact roles, Yeehaa brings a unique blend of creativity and analytical skills to any team. Accomplished in innovation, project leadership, and user-centered design, he is driven by a passion for creating impactful solutions. Yeehaa wrote 'Across Space And Time,' exploring ecosystems in nature and modern contexts.
blurb: The article explores the biological and modern contextual meanings of ecosystems, proposing new practices in ecosystem architecture, emphasizing decentralization and regenerative design.
